metadata.title: CVE-2021-3660 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Cockpit (and its plugins) do not seem to protect itself againstclickjacking. It is possible to render a page from a cockpit server viaanother website, inside an <iFrame> HTML entry. This may be used by amalicious website in clickjacking or similar attacks.

criterions.comment: cockpit package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
